name: Perspect (Fish Taco & Co.)
description: Perspect is a game meant to challenge the players ability to look at a situation from multiple angles. In this game, rotate the camera (arrow keys) to determine how to jump through secret doors, and also find the secret doors. Move the player (WASD) and find ways to get through the levels. Reach the blue finish square while collecting all three cubes to win each level.
